Package com.joliciel.talismane.rawText

Package managing the initial filtering of an input stream, such as in the case of XML analysis, where the XML tags need to be removed, and in some case represent sentence breaks.

See: Description

  • Interface Summary 
    Interface Description
    RawTextAnnotator
    An annotator for a block of raw text.
  • Class Summary 
    Class Description
    DuplicateWhiteSpaceFilter
    Gets rid of duplicate whitespace.
    NewlineEndOfSentenceMarker
    Replace any newline with a sentence break.
    NewlineSpaceMarker
    Replace any newline with a space.
    OtherWhiteSpaceFilter
    Replaces any whitespace characters (including tabs) by a standard whitespace.
    RawText
    An annotated text which can be filtered and sentence-detected, after which we can retrieve the resulting sentences.
    RawTextAnnotatorFactory  
    RawTextMarker
    A marker added in an annotation by a TextMarkerFilter.
    RawTextMarker.RawTextNoSentenceBreakMarker  
    RawTextMarker.RawTextReplaceMarker  
    RawTextMarker.RawTextSentenceBreakMarker  
    RawTextMarker.RawTextSkipMarker  
    RawTextProcessor
    A class capable of processing a set of RawTextFilters so that a list of sentences can be extracted.
    RawTextRegexAnnotator
    For a given regex, finds any matches within the text, and adds the appropriate marker to these matches.
    RollingTextBlock
    A block of raw text, always containing four sub-blocks, which are rolled in from right to left.
    Sentence
    A sentence detected by the sentence detector, including information about the original location of the sentence in the stream being processed, and about any text in the original stream that has been marked for raw inclusion in Talismane's output.
  • Enum Summary 
    Enum Description
    RawTextMarkType
    An action to take by a particular TextMarkerFilter.
    These actions are either stack based or unary.
    Stack-based markers can be nested.
    If unary markers (e.g.
  • Exception Summary 
    Exception Description
    MatchTooLargeException
    Thrown when a regex annotator match is bigger than the rolling block size.

Package com.joliciel.talismane.rawText Description

Package managing the initial filtering of an input stream, such as in the case of XML analysis, where the XML tags need to be removed, and in some case represent sentence breaks.
